entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is being pursued by Death Eaters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, who helps him escape from danger.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend and companion, who uses magic to transport them through space and time.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is being pursued by Harry.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, who are trying to capture or kill Harry.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The home of the Weasley family, where Harry and his friends were staying before they escaped.

entities.name: tottenham court road
entities.description: A street in London where Harry and his friends end up after being transported through space and time.

relationships.description: Hermione used magic to transport Harry through space and time.
Ron helped Harry escape from danger by catching hold of Hermione's arm.
